# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README in_line_comment.cir tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}BUG_139/in_line_comment.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} in_line_comment.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}BUG_139/in_line_comment.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}BUG_139/in_line_comment.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP in_line_comment.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}BUG_139/in_line_comment.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} in_line_comment.cir ${OutputDataDir}/BUG_139/in_line_comment.cir.prn in_line_comment.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}BUG_139/in_line_comment.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED in_line_comment.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}BUG_139/in_line_comment.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind")
endif()
